title: Calories in a Fuji Apple
meta_description: Discover calories in a fuji apple, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, and full nutrition breakdown per medium fruit with quick tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Medium Fuji apple (~182 g with skin, raw, unpeeled); values based on USDA data for typical size and variety.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; organic vs. conventional may differ slightly. Weigh for precision.

quick_answer.text: A medium Fuji apple provides ~95 kcal, 25 g carbs, and 4.4 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Small Fuji apple (~130 g vs. medium)

faqs.q: How many calories in a medium Fuji apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium Fuji apple with skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs and fiber in a Fuji apple?
faqs.a: ≈25 g total carbs and 4.4 g fiber per medium apple.

faqs.q: Are Fuji apples high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 19 g natural sugars per medium apple, mostly fructose.

faqs.q: Does peeling a Fuji apple change calories?
faqs.a: Slightly—peeling removes ~10 kcal and some fiber.

faqs.q: How does Fuji apple nutrition compare to other varieties?
faqs.a: Similar to Gala or Honeycrisp; Fuji may be slightly sweeter with comparable calories around 95 kcal per medium.
